title: Navigate forwards to an expanded accordion header in reading mode
task: navigate forwards to expanded accordion header
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the 'Personal Information' accordion header
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.

title: Navigate backwards to an expanded accordion header in reading mode
task: navigate backwards to expanded accordion header
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, and hides the content associated with the 'Personal Information' accordion header while leaving it expanded
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.

title: Navigate into an accordion panel in reading mode
task: navigate into accordion panel
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate into the accordion panel.
assertion2: Name of region ('Personal Information') is conveyed
assertion4: The ability to enter text into the input is conveyed
assertion5: State of the input (required) is conveyed
